title: Mass. man aboard Gaza aid flotilla arrested by Israeli forces after boats are intercepted, activists say
author: Darin Zullo
bullets: World News The Sheffield resident and his brother have been sailing on the Global Sumud Flotilla, which set out to supply Gazans with humanitarian aid.

man was taken into custody by Israeli forces after several boats in the Global Sumud Flotilla were intercepted.

title: Watch: Cohasset native Ben Rice belts home run to help Yankees start hot vs. Red Sox
author: Trevor Hass
bullets: Boston Red Sox Despite his roots, Rice grew up a Yankees fan in a Red Sox household.
Ben Rice grew up in Massachusetts but loved the Yankees.

Danielle Parhizkaran/The Boston Globe By Trevor Hass October 1, 2025 | 7:02 PM 1 minute to read Growing up in Cohasset, Ben Rice gravitated toward baseball at an early age and dreamed of one day playing in the Majors.
